job_desc: 一、Applicants should hold a Ph.D. degree in Translation/Interpretation and have substantial experience in the industry. 二、Applicants should first submit their application form as attached to alls@cycu.edu.tw by Feb. 27, 2019.     Selected candidates will be notified to send items listed below by Mar. 15, 2019. 1. Two reference    letters 2. Curriculum vitae 3. Official transcripts and photocopies of diplomas (foreign documents need     to be authenticated by Taiwan Representative Office). 4. Copies of thesis and scholarly publications 5.     Syllabi of courses to be offered 6. Other supporting materials. Invited candidates will be scheduled to     conduct a teaching demonstration or an academic speech for further evaluation. https://drive.google.com/file/d/14qOHHobSZ8v8q3OWkMylxvSOb6QzNm3a/view?usp=sharing三、聯絡人：蘇彧萱(電話：03-2656601；E-mail：dreaming25@cycu.edu.tw)四、收件截止日：108年2月27日止，以掛號送達(郵戳為憑)。五、收件地址：320桃園市中壢區中北路200號    中原大學  應外系王乾安主任收；    信封左下方請註明應徵職務名稱錄取與否均不退件。
job_title: 中原大學應外系徵聘專任助理教授(以上)1名
